publicationStmt.availability: All texts included in this collection are in the public domain. The markup is published with a Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) licence.

projectDesc.p: This is the Hungarian novel corpus for the ELTeC, the European Literary Text Collection, produced by the COST Action Distant Reading for European Literary History (CA16204, https://distant-reading.net).
This repository is maintained by the Centre for Digital Humanities at the Eötvös University of Sciences (ELTE.DH www.elte-dh.hu)
